column5: On my way to work this week. A new construction job site started at Rutherford rd, and humber river. So every morning they have closed one lane going east. Funny thing is this is not the problem.The traffic going west are the ones having crashes. So many that a couple of tow trucks sit there. The cause of the crashes, When the guys are trying to turn into the site. They are getting plowed into.. This is a full Construction job. their is barriers and pillions and fencing. This site isn't going any where soon. If thees crashes where happening in the middle of the day, it would be understandable. For people that don't travel the area every day they wouldn't know the site was there. But this is 6:30 in the morning. The same people every morning. What is wrong with people. Are they born with out brains!!!!!.
Yes, they are born without brains. Many of them live here in Barrie and crash on their way to Toronto. Mostly when the road is clear, dry and in sunny weather.
Ah yes! The lowly ignorant construction worker, I know them well!  ... as a matter of fact, I are one!
Wow, first the shampoo and conditioner rant and now 7 days later this! You lead a troubled life my friend.
He,s just trying to fit in Chris.
Ah, com'on Dawg, you stand at least 6 feet tall I thought. You ain't lowly....
oh i hope he doesnt turn on CNN and see whats going on in the world...dont do it !!!! for the love of god !!!!! dont do it !!!!
Na, just 5'-9" here... and if that isn't lowly enough for you, just pass out and leave your bottle of black Cuban rum unattended!
Watch CNN. The wife won't even allow me to read the Sun.
by and large people just don't leave enough space.
Chris. Troubled is my middle name. Or is it , international man of mystery. I never can remember.
Smart woman..that way she will never have to witness her husband wearing a belt hiked up to his belly botton and suspenders at the same time  suspenders and a belt = serious trust issues
